channel.title: Weird portfowarding problem
channel.description: Well i port forwarded, my friend can join and i posted the server on the server status, but after i rebooted my comp, my friend cant join anymore and its offline on server status.. :confused: :confused: :confused: can anyone help? this is weird..

item.title: Weird portfowarding problem
item.dc:creator: @I_Corrupt_I I Corrupt I
item.description:
@I_Corrupt_I wrote:

[quote=“Chassy13, post:2, topic:340013”]Make sure that your IP has not changed. If it did, you will need to change your opened ports to follow the new IP. Also check to make sure No-IP is updated.[/quote]Nope, didnt work :(… please i really want my server to be up and running… (PS, am i suppose to run the server first? or the No-Ip DUC?)

EDIT: How do i stop my ip from changing?

Read full topic

item.title: Weird portfowarding problem
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make sure that your IP has not changed. If it did, you will need to change your opened ports to follow the new IP. Also check to make sure No-IP is updated.

Read full topic
